H0.text: What world leader famously wore a dhoti (a type of loincloth). Jawaharlal Nehru

H1.text: What world leader famously wore a dhoti (a type of loincloth). Subhas Chandra Bose

H2.text: What world leader famously wore a dhoti (a type of loincloth). Aung San Suu Kyi

H3.text: What world leader famously wore a dhoti (a type of loincloth). Gnadhi

A4.text: Nehru's preference for the sherwani ensured it continues to be considered formal wear in North India today.

A5.text: Gandhi adopted the short dhoti woven with hand-spun yarn as a mark of identification with India's rural poor.
